overview:
## Discussion

Create an instance of this class when the system launches your app with an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity] of type `ASCredentialExchangeActivityType`, then call [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASCredentialImportManager/importCredentials(token:)] to import credentials from the source app.

# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an import manager instance.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Create an instance of this class when the system launches your app with an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity] of type `ASCredentialExchangeActivityType`, then call [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASCredentialImportManager/importCredentials(token:)] to import credentials from the source app.
title: init()
